title: DDFP 608: Week 7 Red Challenge Flag picks & Worst Types of Fans
itunes:title: DDFP 608: Week 7 Red Challenge Flag picks & Worst Types of Fans
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Cynthia Frelund, Matt “Money” Smith and Handsome Hank all the way from the NFL offices in London to discuss the Cardinals vs Rams matchup, honing in on whether or not Adrian Peterson will have another great performance (14:00). Also, Producer Eddie Spaghetti goes through his list of the worst types of fans at sporting events, featuring the guy with the “D-Fence” sign and grown men with their faces painted (25:40). Then, EmmaVP reads her Week 7 "TV Guide" soap opera edition previews for the biggest matchups for the group to preview and make their Red Challenge Flag picks (47:30). Plus, Sideline Savy catches up with James Jones in the NFL Network green room (44:12).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
